name: Element_appendToTest
description: Unit tests for the appendTo functionality of the Element class.

test_cases.name: testAppendToSuccess
test_cases.description: Tests the successful appending of a child element to a parent element.

test_cases.name: testAppendToNullParent
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior when attempting to append a child element to a null parent, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
